dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated= now() | project-rename userType=type, userId=id

source
| extend TimeGenerated= now() | project-rename callType=type, meetingUuid=uuid

source
| extend TimeGenerated= now() | project-rename usageDate=['date']

source
| extend TimeGenerated= now() | project-rename reportDate=['date']

connectorUiConfig.title: Zoom Reports (using REST API) (Preview)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Zoom Reports](https://zoom.us) data connector provides the capability to ingest [Zoom Report events](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/reference/zoom-api/methods/#tag/Reports) into Microsoft Sentinel.

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

customs.name: Zoom API access
customs.description: Access to the Zoom API through a service principal is required.

instructionSteps.description: Follow [Zoom instructions](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth/) to create a service principal with access to the Zoom API.
instructionSteps.title: Connect to Zoom API to start collecting logs in Microsoft Sentinel
